meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from), (완곡한 표현) pass away[on], (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...
seek medicine after death, the doctor after death, After death comes a doctor, prescription after death
counting the age of one's dead child

vlive.korean: 죽은 척한다 또 - 또 죽은 척해? He's pretending again. - As if it's dead? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.21 TTT #1 (Camping Ver.)

vlive.english: "HYUNJIN! Wake up"! - I'm not dead, am I?
